website_summaries.verdict: A 12 by 12-foot freestanding vinyl pergola that adds a relaxing living space to your outdoor environment.
pros: New England Arbors' Regency vinyl pergola is designed to be nearly maintenance free
Under normal conditions, it won't warp, crack, splinter, or yellow for many years
The pergola is designed for ease of assembly and, in most cases, can be fully installed in a single day
cons: This kit does not come with everything you need for installation, so there will be additional expenses to consider

customer_reviews.title: Great Pergola for Cement Patio
customer_reviews.text: We love this 12 X 12 Pergola. We bought it for the new cement area in our backyard. We plan on putting a table and chairs set under it for outdoor eating and hanging out. It is very beautiful and really makes our yard look great. We did use Amazon Home Services to have someone put it together for us. It is a big pergola and it would have taken a full day or two for my husband to put together by himself. In fact, the Amazon Home Services sent 2 people to set it up and it took about 5 hours. We highly recommend this beautiful pergola.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: The New England Arbor's 12' x 12' Regency pergola was a great purchase and the Amazon price was a steal compare to comparable pergolas I found elsewhere. From the prompt delivery (in perfect condition) to the easy assembly, I could not have asked for more. Took me about 10 hours from start to finish to assemble everything. You really need the assistance of at least one strong helper to lift the beams and rafters into their proper location. After assembly I bought a canvas weave canopy (also made by New England) ... provides great shade.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Jones

customer_reviews.title: Great product & amazing customer support from seller/manufacturer
customer_reviews.text: A fine product & absolutely solid support from the manufacturer. I received a couple of parts damaged due to damage to a box during shipping which were replaced quickly with no questions asked! The manufacturer went above & beyond to help with the product & provided a replacement for one of the main columns which had a 4x4 stuck inside during installation. Five stars to the product & customer support!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One of the finest quality products you will ever purchase
customer_reviews.text: One of the finest quality products you will ever purchase. Probably the clearest assembly instructions I have ever seen. The hardest part was digging the footings. Took 4 experienced men a day to erect. Started at 8am, dug footings, added cement for the 4x4 posts and then started. Probably would have doubled the amount of cement from 4 bags to 8 bags - 2 per hole. Use Quickcrete red bag, sets in 45 minutes. Entire project was complete at 6:30 that night and this included cutting brick pavers. Manhattans served at 7pm under the new pergola. High quality product and absolutely no cutting. Remember the old adage - "start square and end square".
customer_reviews.author: df Don

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product and completely transformed by backyard. I was able to complete the installation starting Friday after work and finishing up early Saturday afternoon. Directions were very comprehensible and clear. Very satisfied with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: G Buchsen

customer_reviews.title: Love IT
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this two years ago and it still looks great! I love how it adds a more finished look on my patio. I've always wanted a pergola and this worked out great. I priced many and this was the most economical one for me other than building a custom one. Keep in mind that you must purchase the wood that goes into the vinyl. That obviously added to the cost as well as purchasing the anchors I needed to drill into the cement patio. This year I purchased the shades that get weaved through the top. That was a much needed addition for me since I get full sun on my patio.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra from MA

customer_reviews.title: Very beautiful.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent!!! Very beautiful. We added a curtain to one side (west) and a shade to the other side (south) to block the sun. My only suggestion for installation of the bolt down brackets is to not use Tapcon screws to screw into a concrete base, I had nothing but trouble (but not the fault of New England Arbors). Use a different concrete fastener.
customer_reviews.author: William A Kish

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful addition to our deck.
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful addition to our deck. Just take a look at the images attached. We also purchased the sunshades that provide a lot of shade during the day.
customer_reviews.author: Kiki

customer_reviews.title: Saved from the sun!
customer_reviews.text: Our east-facing backyard would get blasted by sun from morning through mid-afternoon. This pergola combined with shade kit option has made a huge difference allowing us to spend more time enjoying our backyard.
customer_reviews.author: Larinoc

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Very well made pergola. It took two men about 6 hours to erect waiting for concrete to dry in those hours. It is beautiful and well worth the purchase price.
customer_reviews.author: kathy sumner

customer_reviews.title: Beware you need to purchase at least $200 in lumber.
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking and maintenance free pergola, but unfortunately I did not realize how much extra lumber had to be purchased to erect the pergola- it is simply vinyl sleeves that are slid over posts that must be bought separately. Our cement patio is at a slant for drainage which definitely made it much harder to install versus a level patio.
customer_reviews.author: Julie B. Carlbom

customer_reviews.title: Great but pain to put together!
customer_reviews.text: This took us a very ling time to put together. Sturdy and looking forward to using!!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Hall

customer_reviews.title: Need a couple of hands to get it together but easy to do
customer_reviews.text: Packaged well. Need a couple of hands to get it together but easy to do. Would probably firm it up with some decorative angle brackets. Overall very nice and would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: robert c.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, worth the money!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this pergola. Package delivered intact on time. Had it installed by a professional. Came out as expected. Simply great high quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Pavitar Kaur

customer_reviews.title: Great product and made well!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and great quality! Excellent customer service support too!
customer_reviews.author: Spaarky2002

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with it. The vinyl fits over lumber -- so it is rock solid if installed correctly. I expect it to be maintenance free for a very long time. It arrived sooner than promised -- a nice surprise.
customer_reviews.author: EDG

customer_reviews.title: this is the best and biggest out there
customer_reviews.text: I took me and my wife two day and it turned out great just wish I knew about the new pole items I could have got but cant do it now due to the build done. This is a great pergola just remember this thing is huge. you will spent about another hundred or so on Wood supports but its worth it. My wife and I waited two years to get this and it turned out great wish I could add a photo to the review.
customer_reviews.author: RMT

customer_reviews.title: $200 worth of extra crud to build this thing...and that's if you have a nice neighbor to help
customer_reviews.text: Having to buy $200 worth of extra stuff to assemble this thing is absurd after the amount paid. I wish I knew this before purchasing it What they dont tell you.... (4) 4x4 posts (8) 2x6x12's (4) concrete post brackets at $18 a piece tapcon screws ( i had a few in the garage but not countersunk, which is what the directions say.) I'm literally about to return this and build my own after finding this out. so disappointing... I hope this helps a consumer who, like me, did not see any of this info in the product description
customer_reviews.author: Evan

customer_reviews.title: New England Arbor Regency Pergola
customer_reviews.text: Not being much of a handyman I was surprised and impressed with how easy this was to assemble. It took my wife and I about 12 hours to build and it looks fantastic. We recently had a storm with 50 mph wind gusts and the pergola held up well. I can't recommend this product enough.
customer_reviews.author: John Crimmins

product_meta.title: Regency 12' x 12' Vinyl Pergola
product_meta.description: Additional information: Vinyl never needs to be painted or stained Simply rinse with hose occasionally for perfect maintenance Assembly requires 2 people, drill, level, ladder, measuring tape, and 2x6s Includes a detailed instruction manual Use the Bolt Down Bracket System (sold separately) to install on wood deck or concrete patio In-ground installation requires pressure-treated lumber wood inserts to extend posts Complete with 20-year manufacturer's warranty against yellowing, warping, cracking, and rotting Say goodbye to generic-looking tents or canopies, and say hello to the natural beauty of the New England Regency Vinyl Pergola. Designed to cover your favorite outdoor gathering spot, this pergola trains woody vines to grow decadent shade for your comfort. Crafted to last, this pergola is built with PVC that is guaranteed against rot, cracks, warping, yellowing, and weather damage. It stays looking freshly painted season after season with virtually no maintenance required. About New England Arbors The world's leading manufacturer of premium vinyl arbor kits, New England Arbors was founded in a simple barn in the late 1990's. There the founders began replicating the beauty of New England design with simple, low-maintenance vinyl materials. The business has grown since then, now supplying arbors and trellises all over America and beyond. With headquarters in Port Huron, Mich., and Sarnia, Ontario in Canada, New England Arbors is dedicated to the creation of the most attractive and durable vinyl arbors possible. Additional limited-time savings reflected in current price. Weather-resistant vinyl won't warp, crack, or rot. Never has to be painted or stained. Requires additional materials for installation. Designed for outdoor use. Dimensions: 12 x 12 feet.
feature_bullets: Vinyl never needs to be painted or stained, simply rinse with hose
Designed to cover your favorite outdoor gathering spot, this pergola trains woody vines to grow decadent shade for your comfort
Crafted to last, this pergola is built with PVC that is guaranteed against rot, cracks, warping, yellowing, and weather damage

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars27 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
